Marine Medium Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Marine Medium Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Marine Armour Set: 
 
 1. Marine - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 2. Marine - Medium Assault Boots 
 3. Marine - Medium Assault Gloves 
 4. Marine - Medium Assault Helmet 
 5. Marine - Medium Assault Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure moyenne Marine, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Marine complet : 
 
 1. Marine - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 2. Marine - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 3. Marine - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 4. Marine - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 5. Marine - Jambières d'assaut moyennes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Marine; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Marine-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Marine - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 2. Marine - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 3. Marine - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 4. Marine - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 5. Marine - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe [#Legal]

Set completo di armature d'assalto medio Marine, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Marine: 
 
 1. Marine - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 2. Marine - stivali d'assalto medio 
 3. Marine - guanti d'assalto medio 
 4. Marine - casco d'assalto medio 
 5. Marine - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio [#Legal]

El set completo de armadura Marin, contiene las cinco partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Marine - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 2. Marine - Botas de asalto medias 
 3. Marine - Guantes de asalto medios 
 4. Marine - Casco de asalto medio 
 5. Marine - Armadura de asalto media para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 해병 중형 방어구 세트입니다. 해병 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 해병 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (여성)
 2. 해병 - 중형 돌격부츠 (여성)
 3. 해병 - 중형 돌격장갑 (여성)
 4. 해병 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (여성)
 5. 해병 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]

The complete Marine Medium Armor Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Marine Armor Set:
 
 1. Marine - Medium Assault Body Armor (Women)
 2. Marine - Medium Assault Boots (Women)
 3. Marine - Medium Assault Gloves (Women)
 4. Marine - Medium Assault Helmet (Women)
 5. Marine - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Women) [#Legal]

 3. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊手套(女用)
 4. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊頭盔(女用)
 5. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊護脛(女用) [#Legal]
